Html:
I've got a WP blog using rateit where I assign each post a rating. I'm building a page in this blog that will contain a table showing a list of all my posts and I want to include their rating in this table.

Ideally a shortcode that grabs the value from the DB I could throw in the table like so would be ideal:

Post 1 - [get_rateit_postid="1"]
Post 2 - [get_rateit_postid="2"]

What's the best way of doing this about 100 times on 1 page?
